# oneflow-utils
Useful Utils in OneFlow

## Pre-requisites
```bash
$ pip install oneflow-utils==0.0.1
```

## Contents
### 1. Cosine / Linear LR Schedule with Warmup
- Source Code: [Cosine LR]() / [Linear LR]()

- Usage
```python
from oneflow-utils import WarmupLinearSchedule, WarmupCosineSchedule
```
